segments.text: I'm sorry to interrupt you . Please take care not to make a mess while you are selecting goods . If you don't want it , please replace it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm terribly sorry . but I couldn't find the yoghurt I saw here last time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it's out of stock at the moment . Why don't you choose another brand instead ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not used to other brands .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can have a try . Maybe you will like it .
segments.speaker: S1
